briefTitle: N-DOSE: A Dose Optimization Trial of Nicotinamide Riboside in Parkinson's Disease
officialTitle: N-DOSE: A Dose Optimization Trial of Nicotinamide Riboside in Parkinson's Disease

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Clinically established diagnosis of idiopathic PD according to the MDS criteria.
* 123I-Ioflupane dopamine transporter imaging (DAT-scan) confirming nigrostriatal degeneration.
* Hoehn and Yahr score \< 4 at enrolment.
* Age ≥ 40 years at the time of enrollment.
* Able to undergo lumbar punction.
* Able to undergo MRI.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Dementia or other neurodegenerative disorder at baseline visit.
* Diagnosed with atypical parkinsonism (progressive supranuclear palsy (PSP), multiple system atrophy (MSA), corticobasal degeneration (CBD)) or vascular parkinsonism.
* Any psychiatric disorder that would interfere with compliance in the study.
* Metabolic, neoplastic, or other physically or mentally debilitating disorder at baseline visit.
* Use of high dose vitamin B3 supplementation within 30 days of enrollment.

primary.description: Change in cerebral NAD/ATP-α ratio measured by 31 Phosphorus magnetic resonance spectroscopy (31P-MRS) in the posterior brain (encompassing the occipital, parietooccipital and posterior parts of the temporal cortex).
primary.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

secondary.measure: CSF NAD or other metabolite of the NAD metabolome, measured by LC-MS
secondary.description: Change in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) levels of NAD or other metabolites of the NAD metabolome\*, measured by LC-MS.

other.measure: Safety, measured by the frequency and severity of adverse events
other.description: Number and severity of adverse events from baseline to week 12 across treatment groups and NR dose levels.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks

other.measure: Expression of the Nicotinamide Riboside Related Pattern (NRRP).
other.description: Change in NRRP expression, measured by FDG-PET.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.measure: Expression of the Parkinsons Disease Related Pattern (PDRP).
other.description: Change in PDRP expression, measured by FDG-PET.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.measure: NAD metabolites in blood, urine and CSF
other.description: Change in levels of NAD metabolites in blood, urine and CSF, measured by HPLC-MS and/or the NADMed method.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks

other.measure: NAD metabolites in blood and urine
other.description: Change in levels of NAD metabolites in blood and urine, measured by HPLC-MS and/or the NADMed method.
other.timeFrame: 4, 8 and 12 weeks

other.measure: Inflammatory cytokines in serum and CSF
other.description: Change in inflammatory cytokines in serum and CSF, measured by ELISA.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks

other.description: Change in inflammatory cytokines in serum, measured by ELISA.
other.timeFrame: 4, 8 and 12 weeks.

other.description: Change in the total MDS-UPDRS score in the ON-medication state.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the MDS-UPDRS part I score in the ON-medication state.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the MDS-UPDRS part II score in the ON-medication state.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the MDS-UPDRS part IV score in the ON-medication state.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the total MDS-NMS score.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the modified GIDS-PD score.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the MoCA score.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in the EQ-5D-5L score.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.measure: Gene expression, measured by RNA sequencing (RNAseq)
other.description: Change in gene expression, measured by RNA sequencing (RNAseq).
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in protein levels, measured by LC-MS.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in histone panacetylation, measured by immunoblotting.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Changes in levels of H3K27 and H4K16 acetylation, measured by immunoblotting.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.measure: Genomic distribution of H3K27 and H4K16 histone acetylation
other.description: Change in the genomic distribution of H3K27 and H4K16 acetylation, measured by chromatin immunoprecipitation sequencing (ChIPseq).
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.measure: Folate and one-carbon metabolism in blood and CSF
other.description: Change in folate and one-carbon metabolites in blood and CSF, measured by HPLC-MS.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks.

other.measure: Folate and one carbon metabolism in blood
other.description: Change in folate and one-carbon metabolites in blood, measured by HPLC-MS.
other.timeFrame: 4, 8 and 12 weeks.

other.description: Change in methyl-donors (e.g., SAM), measured by HPLC-MS, in the blood and/or CSF.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks.

other.description: To assess the dose-response relationship between NR dose (1000 mg, 2000 mg, 3000 mg per day) and changes in methyl-donors in PD from baseline to weeks 4, 8 and 12. Change in methyl-donors (e.g., SAM), measured by HPLC-MS, in the blood.
other.timeFrame: 4, 8 and 12 weeks.

other.description: Change in level and genomic distribution of DNA methylation, measured by Illumina Infinium MethylationEpic kit.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks for primary analysis. 4, 8 and 12 weeks for secondary analysis.

other.description: Change in neurotransmitters in CSF, measured by HPLC-MS.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks.

other.description: Change in gut microbiome composition, measured by metagenomics in fecal samples.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks.

other.description: Change in fecal metabolomics, measured by LC-MS in fecal samples.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeeks.

other.description: Change in sense of smell, measured by B-SIT score.
other.timeFrame: 12 weeks.
